title: Miscellaneous Myths: Hades and Persephone
author: Overly Sarcastic Productions
description:
NEW PINS: https://crowdmade.com/collections/overlysarcasticproductions/products/overly-sarcastic-productions-hades-persephone-pin-pack
You asked, I've answered! Today let's discuss greek mythology's most beloved AND most maligned relationship - but which reputation is truly deserved? You all know where *I* stand on the matter, but today I'll do my best to justify my hot take that Hades And Persephone Is Romantic Actually.

Our content is intended for teenage audiences and up.

PARTIAL TRACKLIST: Hall of the Mountain King, Black Blade, Starfall, World Annihilation, Lacrimosa, Voice of Rushing Waters, Atlas, Breath and Life, Fire And Ice

PATREON: https://www.Patreon.com/OSP

PODCAST: https://overlysarcasticpodcast.transistor.fm/subscribe

DISCORD: https://discord.gg/osp

MERCH LINKS: http://rdbl.co/osp

OUR WEBSITE: https://www.OverlySarcasticProductions.com/
Find us on Twitter https://www.Twitter.com/OSPYouTube
Find us on Reddit https://www.Reddit.com/r/OSP/

Want this video in another language? Check out our guide to contributing translated captions: https://www.overlysarcasticproductions.com/community-captions

localize.description:
新信息网：https://crowdmade.com/collections/overlysarcasticproductions/products/overly-sarcastic-productions-hades-persephone-pin-pack
你问，我答! 今天，让我们来讨论一下希腊神话中最受人喜爱和最受人诟病的关系--但哪种声誉才是真正应得的呢？你们都知道我*在这个问题上的立场，但今天我会尽我所能来证明我的热门观点，即哈迪斯和珀耳塞福涅其实是浪漫的。

我们的内容是为青少年观众及以上的观众准备的。

部分曲目。山王殿，黑刃，星坠，世界毁灭，拉克里摩萨，奔流之声，阿特拉斯，呼吸与生命，火与冰。

新信息網：https://crowdmade.com/collections/overlysarcasticproductions/products/overly-sarcastic-productions-hades-persephone-pin-pack
你問，我答! 今天，讓我們來討論一下希臘神話中最受人喜愛和最受人詬病的關係--但哪種聲譽纔是真正應得的呢？你們都知道我*在這個問題上的立場，但今天我會盡我所能來證明我的熱門觀點，即哈迪斯和珀耳塞福涅其實是浪漫的。

我們的內容是爲青少年觀衆及以上的觀衆準備的。

部分曲目。山王殿，黑刃，星墜，世界毀滅，拉克里摩薩，奔流之聲，阿特拉斯，呼吸與生命，火與冰。
